content: Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 10 Dec 2018What is a meaningful gift to give someone without spending a lot of money on it?I don't earn much, but there's a special person in my life that I really want to buy something for Christmas for. I've been searching around for ideas, but nothing seems to be suit her. help!!6 answersAnswerBump1
Answers (6)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Png Cheng Xi DamienLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 10 Dec 2018If you know what she likes to eat, making it for her is the easiest way to the heart. Nothing says love more than a heartfelt meal. Of course make sure it doesn't turn out like burnt toast. 0 comments1

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 10 Dec 2018Most meaningful gift without spending lots of $: your time and attention Spend some time together have a meals , a walk in the park or anywhere scene. We only have limited amount of time and attention in modern days,  which is the most precious gift you can give to anyone and create good lasting memories üòÑüëåüëç0 comments1

Huang YixuanLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 10 Dec 2018How about something homemade? I don't think the amount you spend matters (unless she is materialistic then why be with her??). For me the best gift would be a sincere letter, and maybe if you take her out to say, Sentosa to see the sunrise with a picnic basket. Depends on your girl really :P 0 comments1
Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 11 Dec 2018Write a christmas poem or something funny.a laugh goes a long way :)0 comments0
Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 10 Dec 2018Make something for her! Some ideas include cards, food, etc. Or just spend some time with her :)0 comments0

Daniel Lee, Growth Marketing Lead at SeedlyLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 10 Dec 2018A normal meal and perhaps a handmade card? Personally I think nothing is more special than someone really taking the time to write a card/letter. You can also cook for her, or take her to somewhere interesting that she's more inclined to like where both of you can enjoy the experience! 0 comments0
